title: Pair Of T3 Cards Available With Ad Backs Taking Best Offer
author: btcarfagno

posts.post_title: Pair Of T3 Cards Available With Ad Backs Taking Best Offer
posts.post_content:
Both of these have multiple issues that would get them graded either a 1 or Authentic. Both do, however, have terrific eye appeal. Especially the Hoblitzell which may have a slight non-malicious trim at the top as well).

I will take the best offer either separately or together.

Tom C

Now taking best offer on these.

Tom C
